MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44  postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Wickham Close, Gladstone Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:25AM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed we have a fault on our underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:02AM on 23rd of January 2021.
